name: Pencil.Gaming
tagline: An open-source, cross-platform gaming library for C# with bindings for OpenGL, OpenAL and GLFW.
body:
Pencil.Gaming is a gaming library for C#, with solid portable OpenGL support imported from OpenTK, nifty math utilities (vectors, matrices ans finally a Tau constant!), most of which are also imported from OpenTK, and solid bindings to OpenAL and GLFW, to ensure maximum cross-platform capabilities.

Aside from binding these native libraries, Pencil.Gaming also has a few utilities, allowing you to easily
- Load WAV files into an OpenAL buffer
- Load images into an OpenGL texture
- Load wavefront models into an OpenGL VBO
